statements: SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM market_data ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_source = 'Online' AND quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date_added ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM market_data WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_source IN ('Online', 'Store') AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM market_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT product_name, price FROM MarketData WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, product_name, price, quantity FROM MarketData ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecast ORDER BY demand_quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price, quantity FROM MarketData WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM MarketData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_name LIKE '%banana%';
SELECT product_name, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecast WHERE demand_quantity > 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, product_name, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM MarketData JOIN DemandForecast ON MarketData.product_name = DemandForecast.product_name WHERE price < 100 AND demand_quantity < 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE market_demand > 500 ORDER BY market_price ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE market_demand < 200 ORDER BY id;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM forecasting_models WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_date FROM forecasting_models WHERE model_type = 'Linear Regression';
SELECT id, product_name, market_price, market_demand FROM market_data;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_date FROM forecasting_models ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 100 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_demand FROM market_data WHERE market_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, market_price, forecast_value FROM market_data JOIN market_forecast ON market_data.id = market_forecast.product_id;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, market_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 50 AND sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT market_name, product_name, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM market_data JOIN sales_data ON market_data.market_id = sales_data.market_id;
SELECT product_name, forecast_date, forecast_demand FROM product_data JOIN forecast_data ON product_data.product_id = forecast_data.product_id WHERE forecast_demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM StockMarketData;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM StockMarketData WHERE market_cap > 1000000;
SELECT id, model_name, model_type FROM DemandForecastingModels ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_impact < 0.5 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_source LIKE '%twitter%';
SELECT * FROM StockMarketData;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price, market_cap FROM StockMarketData WHERE trade_volume > 10000 ORDER BY stock_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM DemandForecastingModels WHERE training_data_size >= 5000 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description, trend_impact, trend_source FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_impact > 0.8 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT model_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM ModelPerformanceMetrics WHERE model_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY model_id, metric_date DESC;
